response.overview: Brioc, A Modern Adventure. On the shores of Brittany's Pagan country, an unusual boat is being prepared for an epic journey: sailing from Brittany to Scotland under conditions as close as possible to those of 10th-century medieval sailors. In the small village of Kerlouan, the crew readies Brioc, a replica of a leather-covered wooden curragh once used by Irish monks.
response.title: Brioc
